nodes.text: Shiko Tanderris was the vice-president of the Drearian Defense Conglomerate. After rescuing the DDC president's son from Thalassian slavers, Corvastan Benelex asked Tanderris for a two-million credit loan as well as arms concessions to start House Benelex. Benelex also agreed to let the DDC have creative input on promoting the guild house, so Tanderris granted the loan.
